mapper.select: SELECT free_code, title, hit, name, reg_date FROM free ORDER BY free_code DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO free ( story,free_code, title, hit, name, reg_date,member_code)
VALUES(#{story}, FREE_CODE_SEQ.nextval,#{title}, 0, #{name}, sysdate, #{member_code} )
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE free_code = #{free_code}
